name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David BALLOD, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David BALLOD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgments of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 743
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David BALLOD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 23, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Benjamin Paul, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
